landing.description: Search, scan, and compare food products across Poland and Germany. Get instant health scores, allergen warnings, and better alternatives.
landing.featureSearchDesc: Find products by name, brand, or category
landing.featureScanDesc: Scan barcodes for instant product info
landing.featureCompareDesc: See health scores and find better alternatives

legal.contactIntro: Have questions, feedback, or want to report a data issue? Reach out to us.
legal.dataWeCollectText: We collect your email address for authentication, your food preferences and allergen settings, and anonymous usage analytics. We do not sell your data or share it with third parties.
legal.howWeUseText: Your data is used to provide personalized food recommendations, allergen warnings, and health scores. Preferences are stored securely in our database and synced across your devices.
legal.dataStorageText: All data is stored on Supabase (PostgreSQL) hosted in the EU. We use row-level security to ensure you can only access your own data.
legal.yourRightsText: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at the email below to exercise these rights.
legal.acceptanceText: By using Poland Food DB, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the service.
legal.serviceDescText: Poland Food DB provides food product information, health scores, and nutritional data sourced from Open Food Facts and our own analysis. This is for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical or dietary advice.
legal.dataAccuracyText: While we strive for accuracy, food data may contain errors. Always check product labels for allergen and nutritional information. We are not liable for decisions made based on our data.
legal.userAccountsText: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account. Do not share your credentials. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.
legal.liabilityText: Poland Food DB is provided "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of this service.
legal.contactText: For questions about these terms, contact us at:

onboarding.regionSubtitle: We'll show you products available in your country.
onboarding.dietarySubtitle: Optional ‚Äî helps filter products to match your diet. You can change these later in Settings.
onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: We'll ask a few quick questions to tailor the app for you. This takes about 30 seconds.
onboarding.dietSubtitle: Optional ‚Äî select your dietary preference. You can always change this later.
onboarding.allergenSubtitle: Select allergens you need to avoid. We'll warn you when products contain them.
onboarding.healthGoalsSubtitle: Optional ‚Äî helps us give more relevant product recommendations.
onboarding.goalDiabetesDesc: Track sugar content, highlight low-sugar options
onboarding.goalLowSodiumDesc: Monitor salt intake, flag high-sodium products
onboarding.goalHeartHealthDesc: Track saturated fat, find heart-friendly products
onboarding.categoriesSubtitle: Optional ‚Äî pick the categories you shop most. We'll surface relevant products first.
onboarding.doneSubtitle: Your preferences have been saved. You can update them anytime in Settings.
onboarding.onboardingFailed: Could not save your preferences. Please try again.

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
validation.list_name_too_long: List name must be 100 characters or fewer.
validation.description_too_long: Description must be 500 characters or fewer.
validation.message_too_short: Message must be at least 10 characters.
validation.message_too_long: Message must be 2000 characters or fewer.
validation.ean_format: Please enter a valid 8 or 13 digit barcode.
validation.notes_too_long: Notes must be 500 characters or fewer.

nutriScore.A: Nutri-Score A: Best nutritional quality. Low in fat, sugar, and salt. High in fiber, protein, and fruits/vegetables.
nutriScore.B: Nutri-Score B: Good nutritional quality. Slightly higher in some nutrients than A, but still a healthy choice.
nutriScore.C: Nutri-Score C: Average nutritional quality. Moderate levels of fat, sugar, or salt. Consume in reasonable amounts.
nutriScore.D: Nutri-Score D: Below average nutritional quality. Higher in fat, sugar, or salt. Choose less frequently.
nutriScore.E: Nutri-Score E: Lowest nutritional quality. High in fat, sugar, and/or salt. Consume sparingly.
nutriScore.unknown: Nutri-Score not available. Insufficient data to compute the score for this product.

nova.1: NOVA 1: Unprocessed or minimally processed food. Examples: fresh fruits, vegetables, grains, plain meat, eggs.
nova.2: NOVA 2: Processed culinary ingredient. Used in food preparation. Examples: oils, butter, sugar, salt, flour.
nova.3: NOVA 3: Processed food. Made by combining NOVA 1 & 2. Examples: canned vegetables, cheese, bread, cured meats.
nova.4: NOVA 4: Ultra-processed product. Industrial formulations with additives. Examples: soft drinks, packaged snacks, instant noodles.

score.green: Score 1‚Äì20 (Green): Low health risk. This product has favorable nutritional composition.
score.yellow: Score 21‚Äì40 (Yellow): Moderate health risk. Some nutritional concerns but generally acceptable.
score.orange: Score 41‚Äì60 (Orange): Elevated health risk. Notable levels of unhealthy nutrients or additives.
score.red: Score 61‚Äì80 (Red): High health risk. Significant amounts of fat, sugar, salt, or concerning additives.
score.darkred: Score 81‚Äì100 (Dark Red): Very high health risk. Multiple unhealthy factors at high levels.

confidence.high: High confidence: Most data fields verified. Nutrition, ingredients, allergens, and source information are complete and cross-validated.
confidence.medium: Medium confidence: Key data present but some fields estimated or incomplete. Scores are reliable but may shift with better data.
confidence.low: Low confidence: Significant data gaps. Score may not reflect true product quality. We're working to improve coverage.

concern.0: EFSA Concern Level 0: No known safety concerns. This additive is well-studied and considered safe at typical dietary levels.
concern.1: EFSA Concern Level 1 (Low): Minimal safety considerations. Widely used, generally safe, but some studies suggest monitoring at very high intake.
concern.2: EFSA Concern Level 2 (Moderate): Some safety considerations. EFSA has noted potential effects at high doses. Used in many processed foods.
concern.3: EFSA Concern Level 3 (High): Significant safety considerations. EFSA recommends intake limits. Some countries restrict use in certain food categories.

allergen.present: Contains {name} ‚Äî This product lists {name} as an ingredient.
allergen.traces: May contain traces of {name} ‚Äî Cross-contamination possible during manufacturing.
allergen.free: Free from {name} ‚Äî No {name} detected in this product.

nutrient.low: {nutrient}: {value}{unit} per 100g ‚Äî Low level (FSA green). Within recommended limits.
nutrient.medium: {nutrient}: {value}{unit} per 100g ‚Äî Medium level (FSA amber). Watch your intake.
nutrient.high: {nutrient}: {value}{unit} per 100g ‚Äî High level (FSA red). Limit consumption.

warning.highSugar: High sugar: This product contains {value}g of sugar per 100g, exceeding the 22.5g threshold. WHO recommends limiting added sugar to <25g/day.
warning.highSalt: High salt: This product contains {value}g of salt per 100g, exceeding the 1.5g threshold. WHO recommends <5g salt/day total.
warning.highFat: High fat: This product contains {value}g of fat per 100g, exceeding the 17.5g threshold.
warning.highSatFat: High saturated fat: This product contains {value}g of saturated fat per 100g, exceeding the 5g threshold. Linked to cardiovascular risk.
